title: Boom Boom: Episode 277
description:
This week, I am joined by Bethan & Mark from the Seeing Red Podcast.

Our story takes us to the north-west of England and a criminal suspected of being involved with three murders as well as numerous armed robberies. But can police manage to secure the evidence needed to put this man behind bars....
